member.name: T:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter
member.summary: .NET chart exporting class for Highcharts JS JavaScript charts.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.DefaultFileName
member.summary: Default file name to use for chart exports if not otherwise specified.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.PdfMetaCreator
member.summary: PDF metadata Creator string.

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new chart Export object using the specified file name, output type, chart width and SVG text data.
member.param: The file name (without extension) to be used for the exported chart.
The requested MIME type to be generated. Can be 'image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'application/pdf' or 'image/svg+xml'.
The pixel width of the exported chart image.
An SVG chart document to export (XML text).
Whether to set the content disposition for this object

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.CreateSvgDocument
member.summary: Creates an SvgDocument from the SVG text string.
member.returns: An SvgDocument object.

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.WriteToHttpResponse(System.Web.HttpResponse)
member.summary: Exports the chart to the specified HttpResponse object. This method is preferred over WriteToStream() because it handles clearing the output stream and setting the HTTP reponse headers.

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.WriteToStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Exports the chart to the specified output stream as binary. When exporting to a web response the WriteToHttpResponse() method is likely preferred.

member.name: P:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.ContentDisposition
member.summary: Gets the HTTP Content-Disposition header to be sent with an HTTP response that will cause the client's browser to open a file save dialog with the proper file name.

member.name: P:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.ContentType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type of the exported output.

member.name: P:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.FileName
member.summary: Gets the file name with extension to use for the exported chart.

member.name: P:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.Name
member.summary: Gets the chart name (same as file name without extension).

member.name: P:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.Svg
member.summary: Gets the SVG chart document (XML text).

member.name: P:DowJones.Charting.Highcharts.Exporter.Width
member.summary: Gets the pixel width of the exported chart image.

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.SetBrightness(System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the absolute brightness of a colour
member.returns: an adjusted colour

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.ModifyBrightness(System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.summary: Modifies an existing brightness level
member.remarks: To reduce brightness use a number smaller than 1. To increase brightness use a number larger tnan 1
member.returns: An adjusted colour

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.SetSaturation(System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the absolute saturation level
member.returns: An adjusted colour

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.ModifySaturation(System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.summary: Modifies an existing Saturation level
member.remarks: To reduce Saturation use a number smaller than 1. To increase Saturation use a number larger than 1
member.returns: An adjusted colour

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.SetHue(System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the absolute Hue level
member.returns: An adjusted colour

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.ModifyHue(System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.summary: Modifies an existing Hue level
member.remarks: To reduce Hue use a number smaller than 1. To increase Hue use a number larger than 1
member.returns: An adjusted colour

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.HSL_to_RGB(DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.HSL)
member.summary: Converts a colour from HSL to RGB
member.remarks: Adapted from the algoritm in Foley and Van-Dam
member.returns: A Color structure containing the equivalent RGB values

member.name: M:DowJones.Charting.Manager.ColorUtilities.RGB_to_HSL(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Converts RGB to HSL
member.remarks: Takes advantage of whats already built in to .NET by using the Color.GetHue, Color.GetSaturation and Color.GetBrightness methods
member.returns: An HSL value

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.FLASH
member.summary: Flash utilizes vector and raster graphics, a native scripting language called ActionScript and bidirectional streaming of video and audio.Html outputed by this format will not have the ActiveX fix for Internet Explorer Browsers.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.FLASH_WITH_ACTIVEX_FIX
member.summary: Flash utilizes vector and raster graphics, a native scripting language called ActionScript and bidirectional streaming of video and audio. Html outputed by this format will have the ActiveX fix for Internet Explorer Browsers.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.GIF
member.summary: GIF {Graphics Interchange Format} Is a bitmap image format for pictures that use (or fewer) distinct colors. Interativity will be provided by MAP/AREA html tags, if applicable.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.GIF_WITH_JAVASCRIPT_INTERACTIVITY
member.summary: GIF {Graphics Interchange Format} Is a bitmap image format for pictures that use (or fewer) distinct colors. Interativity will be provided by JavaScript solution and backed up by MAP/AREA html tags, if applicable.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.SVG
member.summary: {Scalable Vector Graphics}

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.PNG
member.summary: PNG (Portable Network Graphics) is a lossless bitmap image format. Interativity will be provided by MAP/AREA html tags, if applicable.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.PNG_WITH_JAVASCRIPT_INTERACTIVITY
member.summary: PNG (Portable Network Graphics) is a lossless bitmap image format. Interativity will be provided by JavaScript solution and backed up by MAP/AREA html tags, if applicable.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.JPEG
member.summary: JPEG (Joint Photographic Experts Group) loose compression image format for photographs. Interativity will be provided by MAP/AREA html tags, if applicable.

member.name: F:DowJones.Charting.Manager.OutputChartType.JPEG_WITH_JAVASCRIPT_INTERACTIVITY
